content:
To normalize the provided profile data, I will follow the guidelines outlined for company names, job titles, skills, locations, and dates. Let's proceed with the normalization process.

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "VP of Eng.",
  "location": "SF, CA",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Sci",
    "ML"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions inc.",
      "title": "VP Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Sr. Software Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Remote"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Science",
    "Machine Learning"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Senior Software Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Remote"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF to full city name; Expanded engineering and data science abbreviations; Standardized company suffix."
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "VP of Eng." was expanded to "Vice President of Engineering".
   
2. **Location Normalization**:
   - "SF, CA" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".

3. **Key Skills Normalization**:
   - "Data Sci" was expanded to "Data Science".
   - "ML" was expanded to "Machine Learning".

4. **Experience Normalization**:
   - Company name "Tech Solutions inc." was standardized to "Tech Solutions Inc.".
   - Job title "VP Eng." was expanded to "Vice President of Engineering".
   - Job title "Sr. Software Developer" was expanded to "Senior Software Developer".
   - Location "San Francisco" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - Dates were converted to ISO format: "March 2018" to "2018-03", "June 2015" to "2015-06", and "February 2018" to "2018-02".

5. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added notes to highlight key changes and expansions made during normalization.
